Our friends at Anker Solix built a big launch sale on Wednesday around their new rolling beast of a backup power plant for your home, appliances and Apple devices — the F3000 Portable Power Station. Right now you can get an amazing $1,000 off the electrical generator itself. And in addition to the basic F3000 Portable Power Station launch deal, you can score even more savings on bundles pairing it with other essentials, like extension batteries, solar panels and power cables.

The launch sale with all the options below runs through Wednesday, July 2.

Anker Solix F3000 Portable Power Station launch deal: Get $1,000 or more off

Big-time backup power

Anker Solix F3000 Portable Power Station

Generating 3,072Wh, 120/240V output and 6,000-watt recharging, this rolling generators is great for home power backup as well as camping. Expandable to 24kWh.

Pros:

  • Backup power for the home
  • Recharges appliance and devices
  • Portable

Cons:

  • Costs more for full potential with accessories

Anker Solix makes lots of portable power stations, but the F3000 is the potent new kid on the block. If it’s anything like it’s incredibly useful smaller siblings, you can count on it as a great power backup when you need it, like when a big storm knocks out power. Or just when you want to go camping in style, with enough power to bring civilization with you.

F3000 Portable Power Station launch deal

Anker Solix calls the F3000 rolling power station “the longest-lasting essential home backup.”

Features:

  • 3,600W pass-through charging: Recharge via 120V generator, run appliances seamlessly during outages.
  • Low power waste: ultra-low idle use, 125 hours AC standby or 42 hours for a 190W (≈8 Cu.Ft.) fridge.
  • 2,400W solar recharging: Dual MPPT (60V/800W, 165V/1,600W) for fast charging with portable/rigid solar panels.
  • 120/240V output: Powers essentials at 120V; pair two units for 240V high-demand appliances.
  • Large capacity: 10 hours for essentials, expandable to 24kWh for 80 hours (30% ITC tax credit available).
  • 6,000W fast recharging: Combine fuel generator and solar for rapid recharge (requires expansion battery).
  • Smart energy savings: Store free solar or off-peak power with Anker Solix Bi-Directional Inlet Box and Smart Meter (sold separately).
